product_name: CliniqueBlackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub is a 3-in-1 cleanser-scrub-mask that reduces the appearance of visible pores and blackheads.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Multifunctional formula works as a daily face cleanser/scrub and deep-cleansing mask to visibly reduce the appearance of pores and blackheads.Helps control excess oil.Smooths the way for clearer skin.Helps prevent future blackheads.Paraben-free. Phthalate-free.Oil-free. Non-acnegenic.Denatured alcohol.SLS-free. SLES-free.Sulfate-free. Gluten-free.Allergy tested. Fragrance-free.Dermatologist tested.Key IngredientsA potent blend of salicylic acid and glucosamine helps clear away dead surface skin cells.Silica, kaolin clay, and laminaria saccharina extract help dislodge blackhead-causing dirt, oil and debris.Item 2541688How To UseFor a daily face cleanser and scrub, massage gently over wet, makeup-free skin AM & PM. Avoid eye area. Rinse off with water, and follow with regular moisturizer.For a 5-minute mask, apply a thin layer all over or where needed 1-2 times a week. Avoid eye area. Rinse off with water, and follow with regular moisturizer.When used as a daily cleanser/scrub, there's no need to use as a mask as well.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Kaolin, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Silica, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Allyl Methacrylates Crosspolymer, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Sucrose, Acetyl Glucosamine, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For a daily face cleanser and scrub, massage gently over wet, makeup-free skin AM & PM. Avoid eye area. Rinse off with water, and follow with regular moisturizer.For a 5-minute mask, apply a thin layer all over or where needed 1-2 times a week. Avoid eye area. Rinse off with water, and follow with regular moisturizer.When used as a daily cleanser/scrub, there's no need to use as a mask as well.

reviews.headline: Just what I needed
reviews.comments: This is a great product - just as expected. Ive bought it many times before and like the quality.

reviews.headline: I Like This
reviews.comments: I like this a lot. I purchased it with my own money. I use it more as a 2-5 minute mask in the shower than a stand alone cleanser. Preventive wise I think it really helps and my skin looks fresh afterwards. I would recommend this.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: Feels great!!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Me and my husband both use this product, that was one of the benefits of product.

reviews.headline: I will buy again. I already have purchased a second one.
reviews.comments: I really like the Clinique Blackhead Solutions. I use it every morning and this keeps my pores free and helps to fight  against blemishes. A big plus is this: This cleanser does not dry me out. It is for all skin types.

reviews.headline: Did not react well with my skin.
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this, and it made my skin breakout by the next day. I have oily skin and it felt more oily the first day I used it, and I was broken out by next day in several places.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Worked very well for me. However, it did dry my face out.  I followed with moisture surge, and I  am pleased with the results.  Definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: This is a must have product if you're like me and get blackheads on your face. It says 7 days but lasts me way longer than that. Up to a month if my daughter or fiancÃ©e doesn't get into it ðŸ˜‚ It's an amazing exfoliater too!

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I usually don't write reviews but this product is just too good. Ive dealt with blackheads on my nose for forever, and nothing ever worked. I gave this a shot and i saw results after just one use. I use it as a facemask.

reviews.headline: I love this!!
reviews.comments: I have oily acne prone skin. I use this of a morning and then the clinique foam wash, toner, etc st nigjt and my skin looks so much better!

reviews.headline: I really like it so far!
reviews.comments: I just used this product and instantly noticed my pores around my nostrils/ under eye near nose were smaller than I started. THIS IS NOT A CLEANSER!! Wash your face first please before any exfoliating product! I have sensitive combination skin and I didn't feel dried out or inflamed at all after using this product so I definitely will continue to use this every week!(cleared blackheads for me) I used this as a mask for 5 minutes and then scrubbed it into my skin before rinsing off and finished with a wet washcloth to ensure everything got off and then also followed with the moisture surge toner, moisturizer, and Laroche Posey's Cicaplast to make sure my redness wouldn't flare up from the salicylic acid. Overall really like this product so far!!

reviews.headline: This scrub is amazing.  I am 52 and have combination skin.
reviews.comments: My daughter and I both use it.  Young and old it's a wonderful scrub for combination skin!

reviews.headline: Not the most ambitious "scrub"
reviews.comments:
I looked up every ingredient on EWG and this product is pretty pure. I'm grateful for that. 
However, the scrub is very gentle which is great if that's what your skin needs. I understand that too much irritation can cause acne to become worse. However, I was hoping it would be a little bit of a polisher for my rough patches and blackheads.
We shall see with repeated use.

reviews.headline: Great scrub for blackheads.
reviews.comments: This product is great for removing blackheads. It's great as a cleanser/ scrub and as a mask as well. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: Worth it!
reviews.comments:
I have tried Nuetrogena, Proactive, Cetaphil, many samples from Ulta for facial cleaners, and even other Clinique facial cleaners - this one is bar far the best. After repeated use, I have clear skin and people even compliment me on how great my skin looks! 

If you only buy 1 thing, make it this!!

reviews.headline: This +60 year old loves this product
reviews.comments: I have seen a reduction in my large pores and blackheads since using this product. My skin is dry so I only use it every other day and scrub softly, leaving it on for the length of the shower. I always moisturize well. I'm very happy I came back to clinique. It is treating my allergic skin well.

reviews.headline: It works
reviews.comments: I have been using this product a few times a week for 2 weeks. The scent is very light and the formula is also light. It sorta reminds me of the Freeman's brand clay masks. I have not used it as a mask yet but i have been using it as a scrub and it makes my skin feel really good after usage. Your skin does have to be precleaned and bare to use this product!! It is not meant for a face full of makeup! FYI. For those who have mentioned it in the comments. I have noticed smaller pores and less sebum in heavy areas.

reviews.headline: Just bought waiting to see results, but feels SO REFRESHING
reviews.comments: Just bought this a few days ago! I purchased the acne solutions line (foam cleanser, gel and moisturizer) a few months ago and felt like I saw improvement. I needed to find an exfoliator so wanted to try this! I like that you can use it as a mask and scrub! No big beads in it, but feels very exfoliating and I honesty feel super refreshed after using this! Better than other exfoliators I've used (came from using Hero cosmetics line & cera ve).

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love this product, I've always had blackheads and large pores, mostly hereditary, and have struggled finding something that keeps my pores clean. I'm just happy I found this, it exfoliates and leaves skin smooth, I usually leave on a couple minutes before washing off.

reviews.headline: Weekly Mask
reviews.comments: I use as a weekly mask. Makes my skin feel great.

Not too abrasive on sensitive skin

faceoff_positive.comments:
My skin type has historically been on the dry side, but as I have become older, it has gotten more combo, with oiliness in my t-zone, and enlarged pores and blackheads around my nose. I have extremely sensitive skin, so at my dermatologist's recommendation, I have been testing this product out as a mask just on the oily parts of my skin (t-zone) rather than an all over daily cleanser.

The texture had a fine grit, and I applied a thin layer to my t-zone, which hardened over the five minutes it sat before I washed it off. After removal, the corners of my nose felt slightly irritated (like a very mild stinging), which was resolved after applying my normal moisturizer, but they stayed red for a few hours despite the moisturizer. I had applied the mask before bed and the redness was gone by the next day. The instructions say you can apply it as a mask 1-2 times a week, but due to the redness, I found that I liked it best once a week.

As for the results- I was very impressed! Immediately I noticed that my blackheads were gone and my pores looked significantly smaller. I also noticed far less oiliness on my t-zone and my skin felt overall healthier and more balanced. These results seemed to last for nearly the entire week after using the mask as well. The first time I used the mask I had one minor breakout come to the surface, but I did not have that happen any subsequent times I used the mask. I also found that in the days after using the mask that my foundation went on smoother in the morning because it wasn't sinking into my pores as much. I ended up really liking using the mask on Sunday nights since it felt like a nice way to pamper myself before my work week. Plus, I enjoyed having the smoother skin on Mondays, since it meant I could sleep in a little bit later since I was spending less time on my makeup in the morning. Overall, I really enjoyed this mask and I would definitely recommend it!

I received this product for free in exchange for my 100% honest review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Pore Mask

faceoff_negative.comments: This is a good cleanser but there are a couple caveats I've found that make it not right for me. I could see this being an amazing cleanser for the right person. This cleanser left my face feeling extremely soft and not overly dry. Normally, I use the PTR anti-aging, but with 2% BHA, it's too harsh to use twice a day so I use Tatcha at night. This Clinique cleanser is not drying, with only 1% BHA, so I was able to use it twice a day. Since I was already using a BHA product, I did not see a change in my pores but I could tell this was maintaining my pores well. This would have been a great way to replace my two cleansers with one if it worked for my routine. However, I did not like the addition of physical exfoliants in this product. This tiny granuals feel like sand and the combination of physical with chemical exfoliants can create a reaction for sensitive skin types. This combination is probably great for stubborn skin that need the physical exfoliants to allow the chemical exfoliants to penetrate the skins barrier (aka your skin never absorbs product). Additionally, this product did not react well with my moisturizer, PTR hyaluronic cloud cream. While my face felt extremely soft after cleansing, it made my face feel very tacky once I added moisturizer. My moisturizer has not reacted this way to any of the cleansers I use (Fresh soy, Fresh exfoliator, Tatch, PTR anti-aging, and Philosophy Purity). I don't know what ingredient it reacts to, but I would definitely try a sample before committing to make sure it plays well with your other products. Overall, you'll love this product if you don't have sensitive skin and if it reacts well to the rest of your routine. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great cleanser for specific routines
